productName: Apple iPad (10th Generation): with A14 Bionic chip, 10.9-inch Liquid Retina Display, 64GB, Wi-Fi 6, 12MP front/12MP Back Camera, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life ‚Äì Silver

reviews.name: Peyton
reviews.review-body: I love it so much! I only bought this to draw on and it works perfectly. The color and quality of the screen and Ipad itself are definitely better that my old one (it was like 11 years old.) The size is perfect for me to carry around everywhere. I love the pink color, it makes me so happy.

reviews.name: Phillip Mckenzie
reviews.review-body:
I recently upgraded to the Apple iPad (10th Generation), and I‚Äôm thoroughly impressed! The A14 Bionic chip gives it excellent speed and performance, making it perfect for everything from browsing and streaming to multitasking and gaming. Apps run smoothly, and the device handles everything I throw at it with ease.
The 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display is vibrant and crisp, making watching videos, reading, any enjoyable experience. The design is sleek and modern, and it feels comfortable to hold. The battery life is also fantastic, lasting throughout the day even with heavy use.
Overall, the iPad (10th Generation) offers great value with its powerful performance, gorgeous display, and excellent versatility. Whether you're a student, professional, or just someone who enjoys entertainment on-the-go, I highly recommend this iPad!

reviews.name: Ethel Hanes
reviews.review-body: Love Love this. Larger screen easier on my eyes than my previous Tablet. Dry easy to use. The battery holds for a very long time after charging

reviews.name: theo wells
reviews.review-body: This is well worth the purchase and delivers at a high quality. I was torn between this model and the latest model. This one suited my needs perfectly and is a purchase that I am proud of overall. It does charge fast as S***, takes a few seconds to set up, & as-always delivers on the Apple Quality of visuals. Great buy.

reviews.name: Jealisa
reviews.review-body: Battery life is solid, lasting all day with regular use. It supports the Apple Pencil (1st Gen) and Magic Keyboard Folio, adding to its productivity features. Overall, it‚Äôs a great choice for students, professionals, or anyone looking for a fast and reliable tablet.

reviews.name: Miss.ma
reviews.review-body:
iPad Generation 10 Review ‚Äì Sleek, Fast & Fun to Use
I recently upgraded to the 10th Gen iPad and I‚Äôm so happy I did! The display is vibrant and clear, which makes watching videos and editing photos a dream. It‚Äôs super fast and responsive, whether I‚Äôm browsing, using apps for work, or sketching with the Apple Pencil. The battery life is solid‚ÄîI can go most of the day without needing to recharge. Plus, it‚Äôs lightweight and stylish, so I carry it everywhere. Perfect mix of performance and portablebility!

reviews.name: MagnumMan
reviews.review-body:
Warning! Read this first!

Look for the asterisks in the text below. Read that area first before clicking on the buy button!

My iPad 9th generation has served me well for the past few years but the battery life was beginning to suffer and the screen had a few scratches from daily use.

I could have had the battery replaced, but that seemed to average around $100 and that was a no-go, especially since I was offered just $90 on trade in so spending more just didn‚Äôt make sense.

Now Apple wants $349 for the base 64GB unit but I‚Äôve noticed that many stores have reduced the price to $299, possibly because Apple has discontinued sales of the 9th generation and supplies are starting to dry up.

So, I jumped at the chance to get a newer version. I‚Äôve been a good boy this year and saved my money so I could afford this.

I got mine in yellow since the better half has hers in pink. No confusing these two.

One thing you‚Äôll notice upon opening the box is that the overall dimensions are not much different from the earlier generation.

However, looks can be deceiving. The screen goes from 10.2 inches to 10.9 mainly by decreasing the top bezel and by deleting the button and fat bezel at the bottom.

And that begs the question, how do I close out apps without pressing that button?

The android way, that‚Äôs how. You slowly swipe up from the bottom of the screen to expose open apps and then close them (or choose the one you want to use).

Those of you using iPhones know this procedure well.

Yet another question I‚Äôve been asked - where‚Äôs the fingerprint ID if the button is gone?

It‚Äôs now combined with the power button in the upper right hand corner.

I‚Äôd love to tell you that setup was a snap but I‚Äôd be lying.

******This iPad bricked while trying to do an update and transfer from my old iPad. Thought I had a dud.

Called Apple and they discovered this one was lacking updates from 2022 and needed to update from 16 to 17 and then to 18 before progressing. Since my old iPad was already on 18.1, it was trying to force apps and settings to a new iPad that couldn‚Äôt readily take it.

Mind you, Apple verified this was indeed a brand new iPad and not a refurb or customer return. It had just been sitting around in a warehouse for nearly 2 years.

So, in short, you‚Äôll have to do updates first, and then transfer from your old iPad.

And how do you do that?

* Sign in to your Apple account.

* Instead of allowing transfer from your iCloud or other iPad, tell it you want to do things manually.

* At that point it‚Äôll do the updates as required.

* Then you reset the iPad and start over; however, once the updates are installed they stay forever. Now transferring from either the cloud or your open iPad should be a breeze. A two hour breeze.

Plan on plugging it in, too. You'll suck at least 30% of your battery doing just this procedure.*****

Now back to the review.

Overall operations are not drastically different from what I could see; however, I don‚Äôt use my iPad for heavy duty artistic work nor do I play intense games. For Joe or Jane Everyday, this iPad won‚Äôt present any significant performance changes.

How about the screen? Looks about the same to me.

Battery life? Improved over my old tablet only because that battery was on its way out, but only time will tell if it is substantially better.

I will give points to Apple, though, for finally going to a USB-C charger instead of the Lightning variety. I was getting tired of lugging different chargers around.

Now comes the last question - is this iPad worth the extra cost when you can still (possibly) find iPad 9s for $100 less?

Yes and no. Yes, if you can get this model for $299 at which point it‚Äôs just $50 more than the 9th generation, comes with a bigger screen, and uses the readily accepted USB-C charger.

No, if you have to pay full retail of $350 or so. At that point you might want to live with the Lightning charger and button at the bottom.

reviews.name: Christie
reviews.review-body: I love this iPad soo much! I‚Äôm using it right now, it runs smoothly, the screen quality is amazing! It‚Äôs really really easy to set up! I like to keep my brightness on night mode so my eyes don‚Äôt strain üòÆ‚Äçüí® chefs kiss! I wouldn‚Äôt say it‚Äôs heavy at all cause it lowkey feels easy to hold. But yeah I love it, it‚Äôs pink, life‚Äôs goooood!üòå

reviews.name: Goldfabric
reviews.review-body: I purchased this 10th generation iPad on 3/3/25, as well as a tempered glass screen protector, a case with keyboard, and a stylus pen. I received all on 3/5/25 and immediately applied the screen protector, transferred my information from an earlier iPad, and charged everything. On 3/7/25 I read a news article that Apple was releasing new products on 3/12/25. The new iPad is listed for the very same price as this one. Amazon now has a note that ‚ÄúThere is a newer version of this item‚Ä¶released on March 12, 2025,‚Äù with a link to it. I am so sorry that I purchased this iPad even though I expect it will function just fine for years to come. Had it been half price, I would feel better about the purchase, but as it cost the same as a new would cost, it is a bit painful for me. This is the ninth iPad I have purchased, and they all functioned well for their lifespans, so I expect this one will, also. Five stars because the product is good. Had I known, though, of the new releases, I would not have purchased this iPad.

reviews.name: B Smith
reviews.review-body: Love this , I was originally just looking for a tablet for my music and I stumble upon this one, I thought it wouldn‚Äôt be that good since it was a 2022 model but after reading the results I saw it was good so I purchased. But overall I love this tablet so much, the battery life is amazing , screen size is perfect for streaming videos the sound quality is very good, I can see me having this tablet forever

reviews.name: Judy Fowler
reviews.review-body: This is a really great iPad...it's a new version with all the good stuff....the only thing I don't like is the fact that the home button has now been replaced with a swipe which I DO NOT like. I love the home button because it's fast and easy and it's what I'm used to. .....I wanted a newer version of my old iPad, but I didn't know about the home button...I'll just keep looking....too bad....this would have been perfect....

reviews.name: Thomas M.
reviews.review-body: Works flawlessly for my astronomy ZWO ASI-Air Pro remote telescope control system. It allowed me to operate my astronomy mount, telescopes, cameras remotely via WiFi, or Station Mode, all through the I-Pad in the ZWO ASI-Air app, something my newer Samsung android galaxy-11 couldn't do very well w/o stalling/crashing.. This is my first Apple product, loaded with features, the display is vibrant, app speed very nice, speedy WiFi with remarkable range too, and at 256 Gig it has plenty of space for my favorite astronomy apps like Stellarium and my ZWO Asi Mini control system. Since I'm an old guy, have to say the initial set up was quick and simple, I really appreciate that a lot. Total value for the money.

reviews.name: Steve L.
reviews.review-body: This is the 4th iteration of iPads we have owned. We have purchased 6th, 8th, 9th and 10th generation devices. All have performed wonderfully. The 9th and 10th generation units have a 64GB memory. We had simply outgrown the earlier 32GB iPads. The capabilities of these devices is amazing, especially when paired with an iPhone. The bigger screen is impressive and produces beautiful high resolution images. Very happy with my latest purchase.

reviews.name: Dawg
reviews.review-body: I got this to play codm and warzone but unfortunately it's one or the other because codm is around 36g of storage alone plus all the other apps that come on the iPad itself. It's was my first I-anything so it took me a while to get used to it as I'm a n android kinda person but all in all it charges fast but loses it quick while going so I just leave it plugged in while I play. Quality and graphics are surprisingly great. I wasn't expecting it to be so clear and able to keep up with the fps but it definitely does. Screen cleans way and I still have no scratches after 2 months of having it so job well done there. Now the biggest downside is because codm is such a large file any update that comes along which has happened 3 times already (sigh) I have to offload the codm app and numerous other apps just to download the update because it's unusually large at 11g. But for future reference get the 256g that's what I'm looking to do now!!!! Overall good product just need more storage. And yes I know you can buy some extra cloud storage but not for the apps itself.

reviews.name: King Bread
reviews.review-body: 500 stars. I bought this for my Dad and it was an instant hit. For the cost vs a later gen it‚Äôs a huge value. Light, great resolution, good size. Buy it now if you‚Äôre searching for an iPad. Don‚Äôt waste money buying a 25 model.

reviews.name: Daisey
reviews.review-body:
I love this iPad. I also have a Samsung tablet but this Apple tablet is by far the better of the two.
Plenty of storage.
Excellent resolution.
High quality built-in speakers.
Finger reading power button that prevents anyone else from turning it on - followed by a second layer of security using a PIN or password.
Huge library of apps to choose from at the Apple store.
Works well with the Apple Pencil (sold separately).

reviews.name: Kayla
reviews.review-body: Works perfectly and load apps quick. I got this to play love and deepspace. I gotten this during the sale. Worth it.screen quality is great. It‚Äôs beautiful and I‚Äôm really happy that I rack up my money for this.

reviews.name: Brandi
reviews.review-body: Even tho it‚Äôs not the newest model it looks and works perfectly! Screen size and quality are perfect! It‚Äôs a light carry. I had bought my toddler two Samsung ones in past and it was just a waste of money! You do need a case for it. My oldest daughter ended buying herself one as well.

reviews.name: Jeffrey Lane Knutson
reviews.review-body: Really enjoying this iPad. I have never had one before and this is almost like a mini computer. It can do just about anything a normal person would need. I mainly just wanted a larger screen for my older eyes instead of having to get up and go to my computer. Got tired of surfing on my iPhone and having to squint. I mostly use it for emails, texting, photos and surfing the web. Lots of videos on YouTube really brought me up to speed fast. Plus I shopped around town and no one could top Amazon‚Äôs $70 off price tag. I highly recommend anyone sitting on the fence to get one especially while it is on sale.

reviews.name: Jared Minnick
reviews.review-body: I have thus far bought 6 tablets from Amazon and have not received a bad one yet. Solid quality. The ipad isn't bad at all either. They were gifts and hold up great.

reviews.name: michelle
reviews.review-body: Very easy to use, beautiful camera quality, very fast touch screen, the speakers sound amazing, and the apps already installed for work in the pen is easy to use + additional features.

reviews.name: Rosie
reviews.review-body: very impressed with the battery life on this compared to the older models. it has a nice feel to it and the screen is big enough and to enjoy movies on the go if you already have a apple product the setup is a piece of cake.

reviews.name: broguy
reviews.review-body: I had an older Ipad that couldn't handle the processing speed necessary for apps that I was using. It frequently would hang up or buffer especially when loading web pages, etc. This 10th gen is much faster. My email loads quicker. The webpages don't refresh when they hang up. Plus I went from 32gb to 256 gb. Helps with the higher memory required apps.

reviews.name: Kourtney Boddie
reviews.review-body: I just got my iPad and so far I am really satisfied with it. I‚Äôll give an update if anything changes further but so far great product for a good priceüòÅ

reviews.name: Jon
reviews.review-body: I love this tablet. Its powerful and almost as good as having a pc. It doesn't lag at all and I use it mostly for gaming and security

reviews.name: Sonja
reviews.review-body: Love this is a good thing for me and my family because I have been working on a lot lately but it‚Äôs been a good day for me üíï

reviews.name: Stephanie C.
reviews.review-body: Works great battery last long I got it used in good condition it came in PERFECT condition. I absolutely love the battery life because my phone don‚Äôt even last as long as the iPad does ! It‚Äôs super loud too and fast !

reviews.name: katherine hughescheney
reviews.review-body:
I totally love this new Ipad!!!
I love how it operates like my IPhone!

I got a different ipad earlier, but the power port is faulty

reviews.name: Kat
reviews.review-body: My daughter's 10th birthday was made special with the gift of this iPad, which she absolutely adores. I am thrilled with this purchase. The product arrived in perfect condition, securely packaged, and exactly as described. It works flawlessly and has exceeded my expectations. The attention to detail and quality are impressive. I highly recommend this product to anyone seeking a reliable and well-crafted device.

reviews.name: Mzladylocks
reviews.review-body: I remember purchasing the 1 generation mini pad, and so you know they stripped it from anyone using it, even though I hardly ever used it. The 10th generation is easy to use, and big enough for me to read the screen. I love it and recommend this product.

reviews.name: Mama Bear
reviews.review-body: Haven‚Äôt had any issues with it & works well. Size of the screen & iPad its self is very nice and large. For now since it‚Äôs new the battery life is good üòÇ has a lot of options and abilities that a computer does that your iPhone does not.

reviews.name: Donald Rice
reviews.review-body:
My only experience in using Apple was the Apple II in the early 80's. I found that support the Apple way is what I have looked for in technical support. When you setup an iPad make sure you document every field you enter - Label also. If you enter an email name for the Account and you forget that email name you are close to saying goodby to the iPad, I did forget what email name I entered, and Apple Support was GREAT in helping me to process the unit like it came from the factory.

Remember Amazon satisfy Apple that the unit you had purchased has been reset to factory default, if you entered an email name and forget what it is then you cannot clear that out and Apple thinks you are using the unit and if you want to return the Apple unit you can't, this means you have lost your money. Kinda simple...

Well, I could not remember the email name I used, did I write it down or setup a record in my password list. I looked in all my trash cans for maybe a note, could not find anything. I use a data wallet, and it has worked but you have to keep the data - I went through my last copies of the backups for the wallet and when I got back to the DATE, I received the iPad I saw an item for iPad - I made sure I had a good paper copy, loaded the current version of wallet data and started setup of iPad again. It worked!

Thanks to the support people at Amazon, Apple and Best Buy (they support Apple). Maybe I will try a MAC???

reviews.name: Paul Fredette
reviews.review-body: I bought the iPad 10th generation with cover, protection shield and iPad pencil. Unfortunately they sent me I pad pencil 2d generation which is not compatible with iPad 10th generation. What should I do to return this pencil and get the correct one. The iPad is fine but the pencil does not work even though it was all purchased together.

reviews.name: I love this amp. I plan on buyin 2 more to add to my project. I highly recommend this product and this company.
reviews.review-body: Mine was left at a neighbors house so I was happy I actually did end up getting it because I love it! Love how bright the pink is the size is perfect, it‚Äôs super durable only thing I didn‚Äôt like personally is that the camera is sideways and I‚Äôm a streamer so that kinda sucked but not a big deal camera quality makes up for it! Great price for your money! I also bought a case and screen protector so no scratching but it‚Äôs not slow at all functions as should. If you‚Äôre thinking about buying you won‚Äôt be disappointed.

reviews.name: Jim Duffy
reviews.review-body:
Fast review ,
The updated charging plug is game changer, the old ones were horrible . The iPad is FAST, wifi receiver is amazing. Battery life is better than the older models but not as good as the other reviews say , but it‚Äôs better than the older iPads. I was instantly happy with this purchase. Well made , screen is great for those with bad eyes . Touch ID is good, for those that love the home button you will get used to it the slightly different set up in a few minutes , this allows for a bigger screen too. Best $300 I have spent in a LONG time you get a lot for the money. If I had to pick from only a lap top pc and a iPad I‚Äôm taking this iPad .

reviews.name: Benisha Freckleton
reviews.review-body: I absolutely love this iPad. I got it in pink and it‚Äôs so beautiful. Definitely worth the price and I caught it while it was on sale üòâ.

reviews.name: S. Torregrosa
reviews.review-body:
Unhappy with the fact that after less than a month, the charger doesn't work. And because it is a C to C brick and cable, I can't check it out with the dozens of HDMI to C cables and bricks that I have on hand.

As for the ipad itself, I don't like some of the features that are missing, including the ergonomic easy to use button on the right side. I don't like that the audio jack is missing because it had value to me. The graphics are fine and everything else is pretty much comparable to older models, of which I've owned several. I had to upgrade due to lack of memory space, but I prefer my 8th generation for functionality.

reviews.name: Anonymous
reviews.review-body: I‚Äôve been needing a new iPad for a while, and my previous one quickly dying despite a full charge was the kick in the butt I needed to get it. This is my first time using Amazon Resell to buy one. It‚Äôs pretty much in the condition I asked for, like new. Only very light damage on the box, which was packaged with extra protection, no damage to the iPad, the charger was untouched, and most importantly, it was factory reset! I knew buying from AR was a risk, but it was worth it, and on the first try!

reviews.name: Bri Bri
reviews.review-body: I really enjoy this iPad. It came with its original packaging came with a charger and the block. iPad was so amazing really well functionable it‚Äôs really worth the price although I wish their cellular plus Wi-Fi version was the same price or little bit more cheaper but overall great quality nothing wrong with it when I ordered it

reviews.name: Ashley Walker
reviews.review-body: I purchased the item for my 6 year old for christmas and she loves it, literally the only thing she plays with. Definitely worth the money spent.

reviews.name: Jack Fischer
reviews.review-body: Great product. It replaces my older version of the iPad Air with only 16 GB of memory. I could not update the operating system software on it. I was also extremely limited to the number of apps I could put on it. Now with the 10 I feel like I have a bottomless well of memory.

reviews.name: Shannon
reviews.review-body: Comes in perfect condition works fine was easy to set up and it came with all the correct things the charger, the pin etc everything came correctly

reviews.name: Hannah Anderson
reviews.review-body: next day shipping was amazing love everything about this tablet and i never used my old one :( this one gets used everyday i can‚Äôt put it down haha

reviews.name: Lisa Moore
reviews.review-body: I bought it for my mom and she absolutely loves. The size suits her well. And its very easy to navigate. Plan to buy one for myself.

reviews.name: hm1874
reviews.review-body: This is everything I expected from an Apple iPad. I am a MAC user and my computer is located in my office on the second floor. Because of this, I may only check my email once a day. Now with my new iPad, it makes checking email extremely easy. The iPad is always within easy reach, and I find myself checking email frequently through out the day. Also, reading and responding to texts is much easier as my old iPhone spends most of it's day charging.

reviews.name: Valeria Garcia
reviews.review-body: iPad in great conditions. I‚Äôm still using it. It is practical to study, take notes, and have introductory design courses. Screen quality is nice, I will add a screen protector too though!

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.review-body:
The iPad 10th Generation is quite a bit different from my old iPad Air (purchased in 2015. The shape of the 10th Gen is not beveled as the older iPads. That makes it harder to hold comfortably without a case. The iPad was also very slippery. I didn't use a case with my iPad Air, but this one will require a case. When I ordered it, I chose the blue option. There were only color choices and the blue was shown as a pretty light blue. The iPad I received was navy blue. As I am putting it in a case, this will not be an issue - but if you order the blue you might want to know that the light blue might not be what you receive.

It was easy to set-up. I had recently set up an iPhone 15 backing up to iCloud, and the iPad used the settings on the phone to set-up with very little required of me.

I'm happy with this choice.

reviews.name: S Breedwell
reviews.review-body: That was the best and easiest cover I‚Äôve ever put on! I‚Äôm cover challenged and this was a breeze! I like the fact there‚Äôs an extra cover!

reviews.name: mileynaa
reviews.review-body: I‚Äôm dying ! this iPad is perfect. first off , it‚Äôs a very good iPad for the price , it‚Äôs good quality and indeed DID NOT COME CRACKED. the blue color is mwa , chefs kiss. the iPad also came charged at 90% and from what I know has a stable charging ability. it dosent charge incredibly slow like some other iPads I‚Äôve bought here. there‚Äôs no complaints here , if interested, what are you doing ?! go buy it !!

reviews.name: Princess
reviews.review-body: Super quick delivery, and it even came in the original Apple packaging. I have bought Apple products off Amazon before but they come in a different box with non Apple packaging and chargers but not this time. I love this iPad! I got it for school. I am using it for notes in my academic classes and the procreate app for art and I must say, everything about it is perfect! I highly recommend getting this one. I got it in the bright pink and it‚Äôs so pretty!!!

reviews.name: Roshell
reviews.review-body: Great buy, I got it on Amazon day deal. Brand new and works perfectly fine. Have it about a year now. Quality is great also

reviews.name: Paola
reviews.review-body: Always wanted an iPad and could never afford one until I found this model! Perfect size, great value for money. Battery last days in standby!

reviews.name: T. Guy
reviews.review-body: Very happy with this purchase. I bought this for my little sister who had an aneurysm and two strokes to help her learn to speak in many other things. There are great apps for aphasia and helping in various ways. I got the Apple pen so she could practice writing and point to yes or no. This iPad has been extremely helpful and I‚Äôve had no problems with it and very happy with it.

reviews.name: Dmc
reviews.review-body: I am very surprised how nice this iPad is and the very low price also. May not be for everyone but it will work for me.

reviews.name: Mundie
reviews.review-body:
Product was delivered in safe and secure packaging, in a timely manner. Product retail package was undamaged and pristine. The iPad itself was exactly what we were looking for. Handles my daughter‚Äôs gaming needs, is able to handle multitasking between her class work, web browsing and media streaming all at once. Sold by Apple on Amazon, I think I‚Äôd order from them again instead of dealing with the physical Apple
Store itself.

reviews.name: Davison
reviews.review-body: This was extremely easy to hook up all I did was connect it to the phone and it was ready to use. The charger is fast it‚Äôs great quality the color looks great. It inky came with the charging cord so just like the iPhone you need to get the block.

reviews.name: DCJ66
reviews.review-body: My previous iPad kept restarting even though I cleared all the cookies and excess apps, and this one doesn't do that even though I transferred all the old apps and settings to this 10th generation iPad. Exactly what I wanted.

reviews.name: DJ Cyber
reviews.review-body: I run a small sound reinforcement company and this IPad makes my job easier with its large screen and battery life. I can do a whole show without the need to recharge. I use it with my Allen and Heath CQ20B.

reviews.name: Bought this for my 12 year old.It is strong. She wears it 5 days per week to school and it is quite comfortable.
reviews.review-body: Have my i pad for almost a year and has never had a problem with it. The picture quality is excellent is . Best value by far.

reviews.name: morgan langan
reviews.review-body: Amazing price for high quality product !!!! Been looking to buy one for almost a year now and I couldn‚Äôt pass this newer model - low cost one up. So glad I got it I now use it every night !!!

reviews.name: Mike Richart
reviews.review-body:
I got this for my wife to replace an older model. She loves it. Of course, she is in the Apple universe, I am Android. So take that into account.
Of course it is well made and works as designed. The screen is bright and high resolution. My wife uses it for nearly everything. When there are issues, I can't help her. We come from different unverses.
I think it is over priced for what it is.

reviews.name: Uli
reviews.review-body:
I have an old MacBook Pro that no longer works for me so I decided to purchase a iPad 10th generation so right off the back I like it a lot!
Very easy to use just need to get used to the swapping back and forth.üòÅ Got everything working card reader, case with keyboard, pencil and a mouse all compatible. I have being playing with it almost all day and still like 75% battery life. Still few things to learn and to set up but so far so good. üëçüèæ

reviews.name: Cristi Jimenez Cabrera
reviews.review-body: Me encanto mi iPad es muy bonita y un color bonito para todas las girls que amamos el rosado c√≥mprenla me llego nueva en caja

reviews.name: Styled by K.Symone
reviews.review-body: I take this iPad with me everywhere now!!!! The camera quality is so clear as well as the display itself. It hold charge very well & if it does get low the fast charger it comes with takes about 20-30 minutes tops to fully charge it again! I was hesitant to buy from a non apple vendor but it was worth it! I definitely recommend if your looking for a iPad

reviews.name: Sherri Cloud
reviews.review-body: It came and was packed ready good and protected haven‚Äôt used it yet bc just got it but it looks brand new and so far it‚Äôs almost set up all the way very satisfied would recommend and order again

reviews.name: V√≠ctor Castillo
reviews.review-body: I loved it because it's new, the delivery was excellent and on time, the packaging was very good, always protecting the product, and the overall delivery was excellent. I was afraid something might arrive wrong, but I was super satisfied with the delivery and product quality. I would definitely buy it again. I've added a cover and screen protector since it arrived.

reviews.name: Abby Louck
reviews.review-body: Absolutely love this product definitely took longer to get took almost a month to receive but it works great for what I needed it for

reviews.name: william sotomarino
reviews.review-body: I love my iPad and haven‚Äôt had any issues so far. If you want cheap Apple products that work well then I recommend Amazon. I have bought a couple refurbished Apple products and have had no major issues.

reviews.name: Mikiya Young
reviews.review-body: I love it !! , good for lots of things , school work , work , and to watch movies, and other

reviews.name: edsan
reviews.review-body: Can't skip this, everyone knows that Apple makes great products. Looks great in this color, got a Navy blue case for it and they make a perfect team!!!

reviews.name: Joel D. Presson
reviews.review-body: My last Apple ipad was purchased in 2017. The new one has a slightly larger screen and I can see all the improvements made since my last purchase I believe the Apple iPad is the best one out there and actually paid a little less for this one than I paid for my old one. Imagine that.

reviews.name: Rob
reviews.review-body: Came exactly as described. I couldn't be happier with the speed, display quality, brightness, connectivity and ease of setup. Would definitely recommend

reviews.name: wyziwyg
reviews.review-body: You can never go wrong buying an iPad. Very easy to use. This is new version that I purchased at really good price. But then a few days later the price went down for another $40 dollars. I contacted Amazon customer service and still was able to get price adjustments but getting a credit. I can say Amazon is really awesome when it comes to customer service.

reviews.name: Rachel
reviews.review-body:
I just replaced my 7th generation iPad with this one. I love the new iPad, with the exception that the iPad doesn‚Äôt hold its battery charge as claimed by the manufacturer. Here are the differences I noticed between the two models, explained as best I can from a basic user‚Äôs perspective. I hope this helps someone/

- There is no longer a ‚Äúhome button‚Äù on the IPad; instead, you must swipe up to get back to your home page. This is simple enough and something many of us are likely familiar with from more recent versions of the iPhone.
- The visual screen display is slightly crisper than on my 7th generation iPad.
- The dock is clearly shown at the bottom of the screen and is expanded to include not only the sites you visit most, but the last four sites you visited.
- To clear apps you have opened and not closed, you can no longer press the home button twice in quick succession. You now have to swipe up gently until these apps appear in separate ‚Äúboxes.‚Äù You can then swipe them off the page one at a time to get rid of them, as you wish.
- The iPad uses an usb-c charger that is not compatible with the usb-c charger for your iPhone or with earlier iPad chargers. The correct charger is included with the iPad.
- The iPad charges much faster with the usb-c cable than with earlier iPad chargers.
- The one negative issue I noted has to do with how long the iPad stays charged, especially with extended use. Apple claims it will stay charged for the full day. It does not. In fact, I‚Äôm not sure that it stays charged notably longer than my 7th generation iPad.
- A word on storage. The base level 7th Generation iPad had 32 GB of storage, which seemed like plenty when I bought it. But as new apps took more size and I wanted to do more things, it wasn‚Äôt. On my Seventh Generation IPad, approximately half of my 32 GB storage is devoted to the iPad operating system and System Data, leaving little discretionary storage, especially when a new software update requires over 7 GB of storage. I can only see needs for data storage increasing in the future. The sole reason I‚Äôm updating my current iPad is lack of storage. I don‚Äôt want to face that problem again. If you run a fair number of apps (especially apps like Netflix, YouTube, etc.), like to download video content, play games, have an extensive number of photos, save documents, and so forth, I would give serious consider upgrading from the current base model‚Äôs 64 GB of storage to 256 GB. I‚Äôm guessing 64 GB may soon be insufficient, too.

This point isn‚Äôt an iPad comparison, but a note on the technology the iPad supports. This iPad requires the 1st generation IPad pencil, not the 2nd, which was a surprise to me, as the 2nd Generation pencil had already been released.

reviews.name: AV8R917
reviews.review-body: What a great deal for the price! I‚Äôm very happy with my 10th gen iPad! Highly recommend! It does everything I want it to and does it really well. Highly recommend! 5/5

reviews.name: K. Moore
reviews.review-body: After my older kindle kept freezing up, I looked for an ipad, read many reviews, and decided to order this one, and also ordered the extended warranty. Very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.name: Pamela S Lazell
reviews.review-body: I loved it. It was quick and everything and after a few days to start acting really funny like I was just like coloring I love the collar on it with the Apple Pencil. Also, my Apple Pencil wouldn‚Äôt work then I‚Äôll send my headphones won‚Äôt go on and then it froze and I had to wait till least 3040 minutes before and freeze again so I called the support team and they were very helpful and told me there was nothing to do for a bit to return it to get another one so I got another one on the way thank you, Apple

reviews.name: Madz
reviews.review-body: I LOVE my tablet!! Omg, it's so good for school work (highschool online, and college) and reading on it. I highly recommend, the packaging was good, it took longer to get here than expected. But it wasn't a bad wait time at all, I waited probably a week and a half?

reviews.name: Rabee
reviews.review-body:
Given its price, this iPad is one of the best options for college students who need a device for note-taking, watching content, light gaming, and casual sketching or drawing. While it‚Äôs not ideal for professional artists‚Äîsince the Pro models handle that better‚Äîit definitely gets the job done. I use it daily for taking notes in college, and it‚Äôs absolutely amazing. The battery life is impressive, lasting throughout the day. I highly recommend getting the Apple Pencil to take full advantage of its features.

I also connected it to my laptop and used it as a second monitor, would definitely recommend trying that!

reviews.name: Wolfdaddy Ivie
reviews.review-body: Always a risk ordering electronics online especially refurbished. The iPad‚Äôs colors are darker than what the pic shows. It came in perfect condition. It comes with the charger however it does not come with a pen. I love it and the price was great too.

reviews.name: Monique Kennedy
reviews.review-body: I love the color of my iPad! The screen size is perfect for editing , watching movies , gaming & much more . It really helps me to be productive.

reviews.name: Tammy
reviews.review-body: Needed to replace my old iPad and found this one on sale. Awesome price and very happy with the purchase so far. Item was packed well and works great. Love the color, ordered the pink one.

reviews.name: ADH
reviews.review-body: I bought this to replace my 5year old mini. Good price, delivery and copied info from my mini very easy and fast.

reviews.name: SunnyDay
reviews.review-body: Love my I pad. It paid so well with my I phone so I don‚Äôt have to learn two different systems.

reviews.name: Lashunda Smith
reviews.review-body: Screen quality is amazing, fast charging comes with charger , ease to setup size is perfect and fit anywhere and the durability ü•∞

reviews.review-body:
Fast delivery. I received in 5 hours.
Good job. Thank you.
This is my repeat order for families.
The product is easy to use, fast, good quality,
Good price, affordable.

reviews.name: Jessica
reviews.review-body: This Apple iPad is working well. The customer service rep is knowledgeable and makes working with them a simple breeze.

reviews.name: Jennel Fraser
reviews.review-body: Love my iPad with everything in me just need the 360 case in pink and I will good to go

reviews.name: Makayla
reviews.review-body: Box was a little dirty, but overall I love my iPad so much I forget I even have a phone.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.review-body: Works very well came brand new I love it I got this for myself for work the picture quality is very clear sound is clear I would recommend getting especially at the price it is.

reviews.name: Will miller
reviews.review-body: Screen size is great set up so easy very durable great function and the speed of the WiFi is nice

reviews.name: Mark
reviews.review-body:
This is my first iPad, so I just wanted the basic model. I use this with the Apple Pencil and it is great for note taking and watching tv on. It would also be very good for drawing if you like doing that. I also like how well it integrates with my other Apple devices and improves my productivity.

I did buy it on sale for around $260 and it is a steal at that price. I believe that Apple is updating this model soon so you may want to wait for that or buy one of the more expensive models for more features/storage. But if you can find this on sale it is a great buy.

reviews.name: Stephanie Aiello
reviews.review-body: The screen is pretty large it‚Äôs easy to do anything on. I love that you can lock certain app with your finger prints for privacy if your a parents. The color is so pretty

reviews.name: Wendy
reviews.review-body: It‚Äôs great, works great I recommend it. It was a birthday gift last minute birthday gift came in right the next day saved me a trip to the store this is legit buy it!

reviews.name: Angela Huneycutt
reviews.review-body: It was for my husband. His old iPad was several years old and it was time for an upgrade. He really likes it so far. More GB and much faster than the old one.

reviews.name: Anachronist
reviews.review-body: I really never dreamed this would be used as much as it has been. I bought pink as a gift for my daughter and it met all "pink" expectations in its appearance. The internal memory was quickly filled, so be conscious of that when selecting which to purchase, but so far it's worked like a charm (sound is nit great but good, charging speed is as expected, and great picture quality).

reviews.name: Knea Morris
reviews.review-body: Wonderful so nice to have an iPad that will take me straight to what I‚Äôm looking up so quickly

reviews.name: Vikki Rawls
reviews.review-body: LOVE THIS iPAD! It‚Äôs SO much larger than my previous pad, MUCH faster and holds more in its memory.

reviews.name: Angus32
reviews.review-body: Great personal follow up and service. I received exactly what I ordered. iPad is very nice.
